alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sunflower, northwestern Leflore and east central Bolivar Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rome, or 7 miles northwest of Parchman, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rome around 300 PM CDT. Parchman around 305 PM CDT. Drew around 325 PM CDT. Ruleville around 340 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Mississippi.
